content.html: It absolutely is a problem that men are dying. But men are the ones that have virtually all of the power, wealth, and privilege in society. Perhaps they should use it to help one another rather than crying about women not being there to care for them.
content.value: It absolutely is a problem that men are dying. But men are the ones that have virtually all of the power, wealth, and privilege in society. Perhaps they should use it to help one another rather than crying about women not being there to care for them.
